name: Aurora
passiveDesc: If Aurora takes lethal DMG, she will instantly gain 30% Max HP while gaining DMG Immunity for the next Cycle. This effect has 16-Cycle Cooldown.
rTalentDesc: Aurora's Normal and Charged Attacks accumulate 1 Echo Memory and 5 Energy, max 6 Echo Memory Cells. Dealing Disorder DMG accumulates 10 Energy. Aurora has 2 Special Echo Memory Cells that cannot be obtained by the aforementioned means.
normalAttackDesc: Aurora deals 40% Magic PWR as Magic DMG to the opponent.
chargedAttackDesc: Elsa deals 60% Magic PWR as Magic DMG to the opponent.
normalSkillName: Normal Skill - Orb of Gentle Breeze
normalSkillDesc:
Aurora launches an Orb of Gentle Breeze, dealing 44 (+0% Magic PWR) as Magic DMG. Each Echo Memory will increases this skill's Magic PWR by 15%, max 75%.
[6EM] Aurora launches an Orb of Gentle Breeze, dealing 114 (+82% Magic PWR) as Frost DMG. If Aurora has 8 Echo Memories [8EM], Mountains' Anchor will strike the opponent, dealing 177 (+188% Magic PWR) as Frost DMG. Mountains' Anchor can trigger Shattered effect if the opponent is Frozen. This DMG is considered Follow-Up DMG.
riftedSkillDesc: Aurora blows an Eternal Breeze, dealing 22 (+43% Magic PWR) as Frost DMG to all opponents, freezing them by 1 Cycle. This skill generates 8 Echo Memories.
fragment1Desc: If Aurora is in the team, if one of the team members triggered Freeze Reaction, Mountains' Anchor will strikes the targeted opponent dealing Frost Follow-Up DMG.
fragment2Desc: If Aurora is in the team, Frozen opponents have their Physical RES reduced by 20% and Shattered DMG is increased by 40%.
fragment3Desc: "Orb of Gentle Breeze" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: Aurora Mountains' Anchor deals 100% increased DMG to Frozen opponents.
fragment6Desc:
Casting Eternal Breeze will generate a Heavy Snow Mist for 4 Cycles.
Heavy Snow Mist: Energy Efficiency of the opponents inside the Mist is decreased by 20%. All team members of PROJECTILE, MELEE, and AGILE Factions gains 40% Frost DMG Bonus and their Normal and Charged Attacks become infused with Frost.

record2.description:
Aurora (~): Since Aurora is a mage type character, all of her attack will be converted to Magic DMG. Implementation of Charged Attack and Stat changes.
[New Attack] Charged Attack (Energy:20): Shattering Ice - Aurora deals 60% Magic PWR as Magic DMG to the opponent.
	Magic PWR: 0 >> 200
	Physical DEF: 0 >> 30
	Magic DEF: 0 >> 30

[Revamped Stats]
	Physical DMG (Base ATK) >> Magic DMG (Magic PWR)

record3.description:
Aurora (↑): To fully utilize her Echo Memory mechanic, her skills will be revamped.
	Echo Memory Capacity: 0 >> 8
	"Eternal Breeze" Energy Cost: 0 >> 80

[Talent: Icy Throne] (↑)
	[New Effect] Aurora's Normal and Charged Attacks accumulate 1 Echo Memory and 5 Energy, max 6 Echo Memory Cells. Dealing Disorder DMG accumulates 10 Energy. Aurora has 2 Special Echo Memory Cells that cannot be obtained by the aforementioned means.
	Cooldown: 22 Cycles >> 16 Cycles

[Revamped Normal Skill: Orb of Gentle Breeze]
Aurora launches an Orb of Gentle Breeze, dealing 44 (+0% Magic PWR) as Magic DMG. Each Echo Memory will increases this skill's Magic PWR by 15%, max 75%.
[6EM] Aurora launches an Orb of Gentle Breeze, dealing 114 (+82% Magic PWR) as Frost DMG. If Aurora has 8 Echo Memories [8EM], Mountains' Anchor will strike the opponent, dealing 177 (+188% Magic PWR) as Frost DMG. Mountains' Anchor can trigger Shattered effect if the opponent is Frozen.

[Rifted Skill: Eternal Breeze] (~)
	Eternal Breeze DMG: 80 (+60% Magic PWR) >> 22 (+43% Magic PWR)
	Ability: reset the Orb of Gentle Breeze's cooldown >> gains 8 Echo Memories
